pageContent.title: Not Quite There
pageContent.emailContent:
â€œYour business plan and research indicate that the cardiology department provides state-of-the-art treatment, that Dr. Carodonza holds his professional reputation in high regard, and that achieving positive patient treatment goals is a priority for every physician in the department. Therefore, you should have identified Taking Advantage of Medical Advances, Protecting their Business Reputation, and Achieving Positive Patient Results as the top three priorities for the cardiology department. Keep these in mind as you move forward."

Thanks,
Annie
